name: Boundary Game
description:
The basic premise of the game is as follows: You are separated from your younger sister in the woods. Currently you have your phone with very less battery from which you can see her location. However, it will last only long enough to view the map 2-3 times. Interact with the strangers to find her location. Some of them might lie due to their bad intentions. You can move forward on their suggestion or on your own. However, constantly disagreeing with them might be troublesome. So, use your intellect and reasoning to identify who is speaking the truth and reach your final destination.

Controls: W - moving forward

A - moving left

S - moving backward

D - moving right

Space - for next dialogues

M - for opening/closing map

Mouse - for selecting your answer and rotation
